intro: Stenolobium alatum, commonly known as the African flame tree, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Fabaceae family and is characterized by its striking, bright red or orange flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has compound leaves composed of several oval-shaped leaflets. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant blossoms and ability to thrive in various soil types. Stenolobium alatum is also noted for its adaptability to different climatic conditions.
